verses.verse: Jude, <S%G2455><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and brother <S%G80><s%> of James, <S%G2385><s%> to them that are sanctified <S%G37><s%> by God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and preserved <S%G5083><s%> in Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and called: <S%G2822><s%>
Mercy <S%G1656><s%> to you, and peace, <S%G1515><s%> and love, <S%G26><s%> be multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> when I gave <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> diligence <S%G4710><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> to you of the common <S%G2839><s%> salvation, <S%G4991><s%> it was needful <S%G318><s%> for me to write <S%G1125><s%> to you, and exhort <S%G3870><s%> you that you should earnestly <S%G1864><s%> contend <S%G1864><s%> for the faith <S%G4102><s%> which was once <S%G530><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the saints. <S%G40><s%>

For there are certain <S%G5100><s%> men <S%G444><s%> crept <S%G3921><s%> in unawares, <S%G3921><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> were before <S%G4270><s%> of old <S%G3819><s%> ordained <S%G4270><s%> to this <S%G5124><s%> condemnation, <S%G2917><s%> ungodly <S%G765><s%> men, turning <S%G3346><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our God <S%G2316><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> lasciviousness, <S%G766><s%> and denying <S%G720><s%> the only <S%G3441><s%> Lord <S%G1203><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I will <S%G1014><s%> therefore put <S%G5279><s%> you in remembrance, <S%G5179><s%> though you once <S%G530><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> how that the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> having saved <S%G4982><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> out of the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt, <S%G125><s%> afterward <S%G1208><s%> destroyed <S%G622><s%> them that believed <S%G4100><s%> not.

And the angels <S%G32><s%> which kept <S%G5083><s%> not their first <S%G746><s%> estate, but left <S%G620><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> habitation, <S%G3613><s%> he has reserved <S%G5083><s%> in everlasting <S%G126><s%> chains <S%G1199><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> darkness <S%G2217><s%> to the judgment <S%G2920><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

Even <S%G5613><s%> as Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and Gomorrha, <S%G1116><s%> and the cities <S%G4172><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> them in like <S%G3664><s%> manner, <S%G5158><s%> giving <S%G3923><s%> themselves over <S%G1608><s%> to fornication, <S%G1608><s%> and going <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> strange <S%G2087><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> are set <S%G4295><s%> forth <S%G4295><s%> for an example, <S%G1164><s%> suffering <S%G5254><s%> the vengeance <S%G1349><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>

Likewise <S%G3668><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> filthy dreamers <S%G1797><s%> defile <S%G3392><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> despise <S%G114><s%> dominion, <S%G2963><s%> and speak <S%G987><s%> evil <S%G987><s%> of dignities. <S%G1391><s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> Michael <S%G3413><s%> the archangel, <S%G743><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> contending <S%G1252><s%> with the devil <S%G1228><s%> he disputed <S%G1256><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> dared <S%G5111><s%> not bring <S%G2018><s%> against <S%G2018><s%> him a railing <S%G988><s%> accusation, <S%G2920><s%> but said, <S%G2036><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> you.

But these <S%G3778><s%> speak <S%G987><s%> evil <S%G987><s%> of those <S%G3745><s%> things which <S%G3745><s%> they know <S%G1492><s%> not: but what <S%G3745><s%> they know <S%G1987><s%> naturally, <S%G5447><s%> as brute <S%G249><s%> beasts, <S%G2226><s%> in those <S%G5125><s%> things they corrupt <S%G5351><s%> themselves.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to them! for they have gone <S%G4198><s%> in the way <S%G3598><s%> of Cain, <S%G2535><s%> and ran <S%G1632><s%> greedily <S%G1632><s%> after the error <S%G4106><s%> of Balaam <S%G903><s%> for reward, <S%G3408><s%> and perished <S%G622><s%> in the gainsaying <S%G485><s%> of Core. <S%G2879><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> are spots <S%G4694><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> feasts of charity, <S%G26><s%> when they feast <S%G4910><s%> with you, feeding <S%G4165><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> without <S%G870><s%> fear: <S%G870><s%> clouds <S%G3507><s%> they are without <S%G504><s%> water, <S%G504><s%> carried <S%G4064><s%> about <S%G4064><s%> of winds; <S%G417><s%> trees <S%G1186><s%> whose fruit <S%G5352><s%> wither, <S%G5352><s%> without <S%G175><s%> fruit, <S%G175><s%> twice <S%G1364><s%> dead, <S%G599><s%> plucked <S%G1610><s%> up by the roots; <S%G1610><s%>

Raging <S%G66><s%> waves <S%G2949><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> foaming <S%G1890><s%> out their own <S%G1438><s%> shame; <S%G152><s%> wandering <S%G4107><s%> stars, <S%G792><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> is reserved <S%G5083><s%> the blackness <S%G2217><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%>

And Enoch <S%G1802><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> the seventh <S%G1442><s%> from Adam, <S%G76><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> of these, <S%G5125><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> with ten <S%G3461><s%> thousands <S%G3461><s%> of his saints, <S%G40><s%>

To execute <S%G4160><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> on all, <S%G3956><s%> and to convince <S%G1827><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that are ungodly <S%G763><s%> among them of all <S%G3956><s%> their ungodly <S%G763><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they have ungodly <S%G764><s%> committed, <S%G764><s%> and of all <S%G3956><s%> their hard <S%G4642><s%> speeches which <S%G3739><s%> ungodly <S%G765><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> have spoken <S%G2980><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> him.

These <S%G3778><s%> are murmurers, <S%G1113><s%> complainers, <S%G3202><s%> walking <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G848><s%> lusts; <S%G1939><s%> and their mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaks <S%G2980><s%> great <S%G5246><s%> swelling <S%G5246><s%> words, having men's <S%G4383><s%> persons <S%G4383><s%> in admiration <S%G2296><s%> because <S%G5484><s%> of advantage. <S%G5622><s%>

But, beloved, <S%G27><s%> remember <S%G3415><s%> you the words <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were spoken <S%G4280><s%> before <S%G4280><s%> of the apostles <S%G652><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

How that they told <S%G3004><s%> you there should be mockers <S%G1703><s%> in the last <S%G2078><s%> time, <S%G5550><s%> who should walk <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> ungodly <S%G763><s%> lusts. <S%G1939><s%>
These <S%G3778><s%> be they who separate <S%G592><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> sensual, <S%G5591><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> not the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

But you, beloved, <S%G27><s%> building <S%G2026><s%> up yourselves <S%G1438><s%> on your <S%G5216><s%> most <S%G40><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%>

Keep <S%G5083><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> in the love <S%G26><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> looking <S%G4327><s%> for the mercy <S%G1656><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
And of some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> have compassion, <S%G1653><s%> making <S%G1252><s%> a difference: <S%G1252><s%>

And others <S%G3739><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> with fear, <S%G5401><s%> pulling <S%G726><s%> them out of the fire; <S%G4442><s%> hating <S%G3404><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the garment <S%G5509><s%> spotted <S%G4695><s%> by the flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that is able <S%G1410><s%> to keep <S%G5442><s%> you from falling, <S%G679><s%> and to present <S%G2476><s%> you faultless <S%G299><s%> before <S%G2714><s%> the presence <S%G2714><s%> of his glory <S%G1391><s%> with exceeding joy, <S%G20><s%>

To the only <S%G3441><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our Savior, <S%G4990><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> and majesty, <S%G3172><s%> dominion <S%G2904><s%> and power, <S%G1849><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> and ever. <S%G3956><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
